## HttpResourceOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface HttpResourceOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [pollTime](./api.httpresourceoptions.polltime.md) | <code>number</code> |  |
|  [pollTimeVariation](./api.httpresourceoptions.polltimevariation.md) | <code>number</code> |  |
|  [retries](./api.httpresourceoptions.retries.md) | <code>number</code> |  |
|  [useApi](./api.httpresourceoptions.useapi.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Optionally use REST to load resources, default is true |
|  [useBootstrap](./api.httpresourceoptions.usebootstrap.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Optionally enable pre-loading from bootstrap, default is true |
|  [useJsonP](./api.httpresourceoptions.usejsonp.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Configure if we should use XHR or JSONp |
|  [useLocalStorage](./api.httpresourceoptions.uselocalstorage.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Optionally enable pre-loading from local storage, default is true |
|  [usePolling](./api.httpresourceoptions.usepolling.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Configure if we should use polling at all, default is true |
|  [useStaticResources](./api.httpresourceoptions.usestaticresources.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Optionally enable use of static resources, default is true |
